list.name: SALTY-BARREL
list.description: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.
list.descriptionHtml: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.

list.name: TRUSTY-SPYGLASS
list.description: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.
list.descriptionHtml: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.
